Trial_Design.evidence: This is a secondary analysis of a randomised trial

Objective.evidence: The association between intraoperative rScO 2 values and POCD at discharge from hospital and at 3 months after surgery was investigated.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The association between intraoperative rScO 2 values and POCD at discharge from hospital and at 3 months after surgery was investigated.

Number_Analysed.evidence: One hundred and fifty-three patients had complete NIRS data and neurocognitive assessments at discharge, and 44 of these patients (29%) had POCD. At 3 months, 148 patients had complete data, and 12 (8%) of these patients had POCD.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The median time with rScO 2 >10% below preoperative values did not differ for patients with and without POCD at discharge (difference=0.0 min; Hodges-Lehmann 95% confidence interval, −3.11–1.47, P =0.88).
